resources.string: Press the SOS button, your live location will be shared with the nearest help centre and your emergency contacts
Fire emergency! Need help now to stop it. Please hurry.
Emergency! Medical crisis, urgent aid needed. Please send medical help quickly.
Urgent! Trapped or stranded, need rescue. Please send help as soon as possible.
Help needed! Involved in an accident, urgent assistance required. Please send help.
Emergency situation! Facing violence, need help immediately. Please send assistance.
Emergency alert! Caught in a natural disaster, need urgent rescue and aid.
In an emergency situation. Please help! Need urgent assistance
